title: Back to School = No Procrastination
summary: I've gone back to school and surprisingly I'm working harder
content:
This Monday, classes started. I'm in the loop of: Wake up early → Study → Work on my projects in my free time → Go back home → Work on my projects → Go to bed early.
It's strange because my loop during vacation was: Wake up early → Convince myself to work on my projects → Procrastinate → Go to bed late doom-scrolling.

I have a lot of free time at university. I go to the library, and nothing distracts me. The internet is good, there's air conditioning, it's quiet, there are thousands of books, no distractions.
I really enjoy the time there. I started posting stories on my Instagram; I put on YouTube videos or music and work on my computer. I can stay there for hours, focus, and make progress on my projects.

I've mainly been working on one of my games. I might post about it soon or make a video for YouTube. I've also been solving something for a client, which distracted me a bit but is now finished. I'm planning another development project. I shouldn't, as it will take time, but it's for a greater good, I swear. I haven’t really touched on Punk Suteki, tnkii, and niupleis.com lately, but I commit to doing so tomorrow. I need to get other things in order that I’ve mentioned in other posts, and when I do, oh boy, we’re going to take off.

Anyway, I need to catch up on some things. The vacation was depressing, so I want to regain some morale now. I feel like I'm on the right track. In the meantime, keep up with my Instagram, my Twitter, and my YouTube because I plan to update there soon.
Bye!!!
